titles.title: A resolution keeping guns out of classrooms.
A resolution keeping guns out of classrooms.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense that federal funds should not be used to (1) arm school personnel with firearms, or (2) train school personnel in the use of firearms.
